flavor: One stone is a small price to pay for two birds.
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn. Trash 2 installed Corp cards. The Corp trashes 1 installed Runner card.
text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn.
Trash 2 installed Corp cards. The Corp trashes 1 installed Runner card.
title: Chain Reaction

flavor:
“The walking flatlined will never know the difference between a cyberwall and a Saisentan. Use that fact!”
—Cracking Corps for Fun and Profit
stripped_text: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, and if a subroutine resolved during this run, give the Corp 1 bad publicity. Remove this event from the game.
text:
Run HQ or R&D. If successful, and if a subroutine resolved during this run, give the Corp 1 bad publicity.
Remove this event from the game.
title: Take a Dive

flavor:
“I don’t know if the Net is made of atoms or bits or something else altogether. I do know this baby’s sharp enough to poke a hole in whatever the answer is.”
—Pumpkin-and-Dumplin
stripped_text: Each piece of ice gets -1 strength. The first time each turn you break a subroutine on a piece of ice with 0 or less strength, gain 1 credit.
text:
Each piece of ice gets −1 strength.
The first time each turn you break a subroutine on a piece of ice with 0 or less strength, gain 1[credit].
title: The Tungsten Tailor

flavor: There have been many golden ages of piracy, each occurring on stranger and stormier waters.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: The barrier you are encountering gets -3 strength for the remainder of this encounter. Spend credits only from stealth cards to use this ability.
text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: The barrier you are encountering gets −3 strength for the remainder of this encounter. Spend credits only from stealth cards to use this ability.
title: Corsair

flavor: “We herald the goddess.”
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 3 power counters on it. Access -> Hosted power counter, pay the printed rez or play cost of the card you are accessing: Trash that card. Spend credits only from stealth cards to use this ability.
text: When you install this program, place 3 power counters on it. Access → Hosted power counter, pay the printed rez or play cost of the card you are accessing: Trash that card. Spend credits only from stealth cards to use this ability.
title: Lampades

flavor: “That’s S4lamander, Maestro, iggy two-fingers, C-Sweet, Johnny N., Tina ‘Kickflips’. And of course, Sir Hacksalot.”
stripped_text: You can install unique () companion resources and unique () connection resources onto this resource. Each resource installed this way costs 1 credit less to install. While this resource has a hosted companion and a hosted connection, you get +2 maximum hand size.
text: You can install unique ({unique}) companion resources and unique ({unique}) connection resources onto this resource. Each resource installed this way costs 1[credit] less to install. While this resource has a hosted companion and a hosted connection, you get +2 maximum hand size.
title: Hackerspace

flavor: “I’ll just need your arm for a few moments.”
stripped_text: Whenever 2 or more facedown cards in Archives are turned faceup, draw 2 cards.
text: Whenever 2 or more facedown cards in Archives are turned faceup, draw 2 cards.
title: Nurse Hạnh

flavor: In the Net, it takes a special effort not to sanitize your equipment. But they manage anyway.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains "Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner draws 1 card.", before its other subroutines, for the remainder of that encounter.
text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains “[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner draws 1 card.”, before its other subroutines, for the remainder of that encounter.
title: Stick and Poke

flavor: “I knew from the start this case was gonna be the end of me…”
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click, 1 credit: Draw 1 card and remove 1 tag.
stripped_title: Virtual Intelligence, P.I.: "You Can Call Me Vic"
text: Once per turn → [click], 1[credit]: Draw 1 card and remove 1 tag.
title: Virtual Intelligence, P.I.: “You Can Call Me Vic”

flavor: It’s easier to dodge a bullet than an envelope with your name on it.
stripped_text: Run a server protected by ice. When that run ends, if it was successful, give the Corp 1 bad publicity unless they derez 1 piece of ice protecting the attacked server. Remove this event from the game.
text:
Run a server protected by ice. When that run ends, if it was successful, give the Corp 1 bad publicity unless they derez 1 piece of ice protecting the attacked server.
Remove this event from the game.
title: Kompromat

flavor: “We’re cooked, maninha. Somebody tipped them off.”
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed resource. Gain 4 credits and draw 2 cards.
text:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed resource.
Gain 4[credit] and draw 2 cards.
title: Sell Out

flavor: In the age of unparalleled digital security, never underestimate the power of human error.
stripped_text: The play cost of this event is lowered by 1 credit for each piece of ice protecting HQ. Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
text:
The play cost of this event is lowered by 1[credit] for each piece of ice protecting HQ.
Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
title: Tailgate

flavor: “Nice job, kid. Now lose the tail.”
stripped_text: +1 mu When you install this hardware, if you are not tagged, take 1 tag.
text:
+1[mu]
When you install this hardware, if you are not tagged, take 1 tag.
title: Borrowed Goods

stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever you breach HQ or R&D, you may take 1 tag to access 1 additional card. click, 2 credits: Trash this hardware. Only the Corp can use this ability, and only if the Runner is tagged. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] Whenever you breach HQ or R&D, you may take 1 tag to access 1 additional card. [click], 2[credit]: Trash this hardware. Only the Corp can use this ability, and only if the Runner is tagged. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Rotary

flavor: Time for a key change.
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Run Archives. When you would approach Archives (after passing all ice), you may pay 1 credit to instead change the attacked server to HQ or R&D and approach that server. Spend credits only from stealth cards to pay this cost.
text: Once per turn → [click]: Run Archives. When you would approach Archives (after passing all ice), you may pay 1[credit] to instead change the attacked server to HQ or R&D and approach that server. Spend credits only from stealth cards to pay this cost.
title: Baker

flavor: “Got me out of a jam, so I lend it a hand sometimes. Same with most of us: favors, debts, blackmail, whatever. Point is, when Vic calls, you pick up.”
stripped_text: When your action phase ends, if a piece of ice was rezzed this turn, draw 2 cards or remove 1 tag. If no ice was rezzed this turn, trash this resource.
text: When your action phase ends, if a piece of ice was rezzed this turn, draw 2 cards or remove 1 tag. If no ice was rezzed this turn, trash this resource.
title: Underdome Irregulars

flavor: “Truth runs deeper than power can ever reach.”
stripped_text: Whenever you install or trash a piece of hardware (from any location), look at the top card of R&D.
stripped_title: Hiram "0mission" Svensson: Shadow of the Past
text: Whenever you install or trash a piece of hardware (from any location), look at the top card of R&D.
title: Hiram “0mission” Svensson: Shadow of the Past

stripped_text: Place 4 credits on this event. While this event is active, you can spend hosted credits, and you cannot lose or spend credits from your credit pool. Run HQ or R&D. When that run ends, if it was successful, you may run a remote server.
text:
Place 4[credit] on this event. While this event is active, you can spend hosted credits, and you cannot lose or spend credits from your credit pool.
Run HQ or R&D.
When that run ends, if it was successful, you may run a remote server.
title: Aircheck

flavor: “I donʼt need a forever answer, I need a now answer.”
stripped_text: Search your stack for 1 non-virus program. Install it, ignoring all costs. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Run any server. When that run ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
text: Search your stack for 1 non-virus program. Install it, ignoring all costs. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Run any server. When that run ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
title: Beta Build

stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever a run begins, you may trash 1 piece of hardware from your grip to place 2 credits on this hardware. You can spend hosted credits during runs. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] Whenever a run begins, you may trash 1 piece of hardware from your grip to place 2[credit] on this hardware. You can spend hosted credits during runs. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Methuselah

flavor: I know who I am.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you play an event, place 1 credit on this hardware. You can spend hosted credits during runs.
text:
The first time each turn you play an event, place 1[credit] on this hardware.
You can spend hosted credits during runs.
title: Touchstone

flavor: Take what you need. Leave what you can.
stripped_text: Limit 4 hosted cards. When you install this program and when your turn begins, you may host 1 card from your grip facedown on this program to draw 1 card. trash: Shuffle all hosted cards into your stack.
text: Limit 4 hosted cards. When you install this program and when your turn begins, you may host 1 card from your grip facedown on this program to draw 1 card. [trash]: Shuffle all hosted cards into your stack.
title: Read-Write Share

flavor: Can’t let it touch the ground.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you pass the outermost piece of ice protecting a server after fully breaking it, you may swap it with another installed piece of ice.
text: The first time each turn you pass the outermost piece of ice protecting a server after fully breaking it, you may swap it with another installed piece of ice.
title: Sipa

flavor: Not only does life exist in the Net, it adapts to our presence and thrives.
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Whenever you make a successful run on this server, gain 2 credits.
text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Whenever you make a successful run on this server, gain 2[credit].
title: Stowaway

stripped_text: As an additional cost to score an agenda the Corp installed this turn, they must add this resource to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda points with "You cannot forfeit this agenda.". When the Corp scores an agenda they did not install this turn, trash this resource, gain 4 credits, and draw 1 card.
text:
As an additional cost to score an agenda the Corp installed this turn, they must add this resource to their score area as an agenda worth −1 agenda points with “You cannot forfeit this agenda.”.
When the Corp scores an agenda they did not install this turn, trash this resource, gain 4[credit], and draw 1 card.
title: Word on the Street

flavor: “Welcome aboard, Moonsilver Class members. Our express stops today are at New Lovell, Heinlein, and Imamura Station.”
stripped_text: As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must spend click. When you score this agenda, gain click.
text:
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must spend [click].
When you score this agenda, gain [click].
title: Méliès City Luxury Line

flavor: The cyclotron’s utility was discovered after its magnets quenched during load testing, resulting in 1,600 tons of liquid helium venting directly into Heinlein city tenements and an anomalous 13-second local time loss. An apology was issued, funerals were covered, and funding was rerouted to recreate the error at scale.
stripped_text: The first double operation you play each turn costs click less to play.
text: The first double operation you play each turn costs [click] less to play.
title: Synchrocyclotron

flavor: Designed by 2021 World Champion Patrick Gower
stripped_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card. Subroutine Remove 1 card in the heap from the game. Subroutine You may install 1 card from HQ or Archives. Subroutine End the run.
text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card. [subroutine] Remove 1 card in the heap from the game. [subroutine] You may install 1 card from HQ or Archives. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Ansel 2.0

flavor: Everything in the Net is ultimately just information—light, sound, runners. If you can reflect any, you can reflect all.
stripped_text: The rez cost of this ice is lowered by 1 credit for each other unrezzed piece of ice. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
text:
The rez cost of this ice is lowered by 1[credit] for each other unrezzed piece of ice.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
title: Reverb

flavor:
He bade write runes on the shield before the shining goddess,
on Sleipnir’s teeth, and the straps of the sledge.
stripped_text: Subroutine You may draw 1 card. Subroutine You may shuffle 1 card from HQ or Archives into R&D. Subroutine End the run.
text:
[subroutine] You may draw 1 card.
[subroutine] You may shuffle 1 card from HQ or Archives into R&D.
[subroutine] End the run.
title: Sleipnir

flavor: It was only a moment for you; you took no notice.
stripped_text: When the Runner passes this ice, if they have no click remaining, they cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run. Subroutine The Runner loses click.
text:
When the Runner passes this ice, if they have no [click] remaining, they cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click].
title: Vertigo

flavor: “I can tell you’re a discerning customer. That’s why you’re here, after all.”
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following: * Gain 6 credits. The Runner gets -1 allotted click for their next turn. * Gain 10 credits. The Runner gets +1 allotted click for their next turn.
text:
Resolve 1 of the following:
* Gain 6[credit]. The Runner gets −1 allotted [click] for their next turn.
* Gain 10[credit]. The Runner gets +1 allotted [click] for their next turn.
title: Caveat Emptor

flavor: All service will be indefinitely suspended by 11:59 pm tonight. We apologize for any inconvenience.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Choose 2 rezzed pieces of ice. For each chosen piece of ice, gain credits equal to its printed rez cost, then derez it.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Choose 2 rezzed pieces of ice. For each chosen piece of ice, gain credits equal to its printed rez cost, then derez it.
title: realloc()

flavor: Your terms of service have been extended.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install 1 agenda, asset, or piece of ice from Archives.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Install 1 agenda, asset, or piece of ice from Archives.
title: Retirement Plan

stripped_text: When you rez this upgrade and whenever an agenda is scored or stolen from this server or its root, place 1 power counter on this upgrade. Hosted power counter: Reveal 1 card in HQ. The Runner cannot steal or trash copies of that card for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.
text: When you rez this upgrade and whenever an agenda is scored or stolen from this server or its root, place 1 power counter on this upgrade. Hosted power counter: Reveal 1 card in HQ. The Runner cannot steal or trash copies of that card for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.
title: Perfect Recall

flavor:
Above all else.
Beneath any notice.
Off the record.
stripped_text: When your discard phase ends, secretly set your identity to any copy of Melies U: Only the Brightest. When the Runner makes a successful run on a central server, flip this identity. When the Runner's action phase ends, gain 1 credit. Side 1: When you flip this identity to this side during a run on HQ, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. If you do, add 1 card from Archives to HQ. When the Runner's discard phase ends, flip this identity. Side 2: When you flip this identity to this side during a run on R&D, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. If you do, add 1 card from Archives to HQ. When the Runner's discard phase ends, flip this identity. Side 3: When you flip this identity to this side during a run on Archives, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. If you do, add 1 card from Archives to HQ. When the Runner's discard phase ends, flip this identity.
text:
When your discard phase ends, secretly set your identity to any copy of Méliès U: Only the Brightest.
When the Runner makes a successful run on a central server, flip this identity.
When the Runner’s action phase ends, gain 1[credit].
Side 1: When you flip this identity to this side during a run on HQ, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. If you do, add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
When the Runner’s discard phase ends, flip this identity.
Side 2: When you flip this identity to this side during a run on R&D, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. If you do, add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
When the Runner’s discard phase ends, flip this identity.
Side 3: When you flip this identity to this side during a run on Archives, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. If you do, add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
When the Runner’s discard phase ends, flip this identity.
title: Méliès U: Only the Brightest

flavor:
“Warn you? Useless. Once they make the biofeedback stick, all you see is what they want you to see.”
—Witch_Of_The_Woods
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Move 1 rezzed upgrade to the root of another server.
text: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Move 1 rezzed upgrade to the root of another server.
title: Lotus Haze

flavor:
“touch it for all I care! just don’t post a sob story if you get bit”
—luc3ne, in the Rig Kids ‘new-runners’ channel

text:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset, they lose 1[credit]. If they are tagged, do 1 net damage.
title: Esca

flavor: A web that only tightens the more you’re lost within it.

text: [click]: Swap this ice with another installed piece of ice. [subroutine] Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D. [subroutine] Each piece of ice gets +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

flavor: Designed by 2021 Asia-Pacific Champion William “Sokka” Huang

flavor: ”Step closer,” you dream you hear. “Feel my embrace.”

[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.

title: Lionsmane

flavor: BZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ

[subroutine] Do X net damage and give the Runner X tags. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. Trash this ice.
title: Vicsek

flavor: To nurture perfection is to know when, what, and whom to cut.
stripped_text: Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards, add 1 of them to HQ, and arrange the rest in any order.
text: Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards, add 1 of them to HQ, and arrange the rest in any order.
title: Cultivate

flavor: “Found you.”
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag. Rez 1 installed piece of ice, ignoring all costs. You may resolve 1 subroutine on that ice.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.
Rez 1 installed piece of ice, ignoring all costs. You may resolve 1 subroutine on that ice.
title: Unleash

flavor: The equipment for asset return and processing is bespoke, and can be set up in less than an hour.
stripped_text: Central server only. The first time each turn an agenda is scored or stolen, place 1 power counter on this upgrade. Hosted power counter: End the run. Use this ability only during a run against another server.
text: Central server only. The first time each turn an agenda is scored or stolen, place 1 power counter on this upgrade. Hosted power counter: End the run. Use this ability only during a run against another server.
title: The Red Room

flavor: It never happened.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you take bad publicity, you may search R&D for 1 non-agenda black ops, gray ops, or liability card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ.
text: The first time each turn you take bad publicity, you may search R&D for 1 non-agenda black ops, gray ops, or liability card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ.
title: Editorial Division: Ad Nihilum

flavor: Of the truth, only ashes remained. Of his former life, even less.
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, take 1 bad publicity. When your action phase ends, if you scored this agenda this turn, remove all tags, then give the Runner 3 tags.
text:
When this agenda is scored or stolen, take 1 bad publicity.
When your action phase ends, if you scored this agenda this turn, remove all tags, then give the Runner 3 tags.
title: Witch Hunt

flavor: “I do not take kindly to uninvited guests in my reality. Have you at least brought a gift?”

text:
As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 3[credit].

flavor: –ect acquir– ₰ –istory dele–

flavor: gimme gimme gimme gimme gimme gimme

flavor: Drink deeply and forget.

title: Lethe

flavor:
“Yeah, I previously worked at a Weyland shop, but the boss had it out for me. Creative differences.”
—Isolde Muraro, ice architect
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 1 credit. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 1 credit.
text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
title: Paywall

flavor: There is a tipping point where an ad becomes so omnipresent, it’s subliminal.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Place 1 advancement counter on that card for each remote server that has a card in its root and is protected by ice.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Place 1 advancement counter on that card for each remote server that has a card in its root and is protected by ice.
title: Flood the Market

flavor: She’d play the part of the dangerous criminal for now; that was the deal. She was too useful to put away for good. Even Lunar Customs could use a smuggler of her skills now and then.
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following of the Runner's choice: * Remove 2 bad publicity. * Choose 1 installed Runner card. The Runner shuffles it into the stack.
text:
Resolve 1 of the following of the Runner’s choice:
  • Remove 2 bad publicity.
  • Choose 1 installed Runner card. The Runner shuffles it into the stack.
title: Scapegoat

flavor: Every season is preview season.
stripped_text: As long as an agenda was scored or stolen this turn, the rez cost of this upgrade is lowered by 6 credits. trash: Place 1 advancement counter on a card you can advance in the root of this server.
text: As long as an agenda was scored or stolen this turn, the rez cost of this upgrade is lowered by 6[credit]. [trash]: Place 1 advancement counter on a card you can advance in the root of this server.
title: Hype Machine

stripped_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) The first time each turn you advance this agenda, gain 3 credits. Once per turn -> When the Runner makes a successful run on another server, you may remove 1 hosted advancement counter to do 1 meat damage.

title: Sacrifice Zone Expansion

flavor: “May our new headquarters live twice as long as the noble kapok tree that stood where I now stand!”
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may host 1 of your bad publicity counters on this asset. (It has no effect while hosted.) If you do, gain 3 credits and draw 1 card. Interrupt -> When this asset would be uninstalled, take all hosted bad publicity.
text: When your turn begins, you may host 1 of your bad publicity counters on this asset. (It has no effect while hosted.) If you do, gain 3[credit] and draw 1 card. [interrupt] → When this asset would be uninstalled, take all hosted bad publicity.
title: Luana Campos

flavor: Even light cannot escape. What makes you think you can?
stripped_text: trash: End the run. Use this ability only during a run against this server. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program unless the Runner pays 3 credits. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 3 credits.
text: [trash]: End the run. Use this ability only during a run against this server. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program unless the Runner pays 3[credit]. [subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 3[credit].
title: Event Horizon

flavor:
“The metakinetic energy of an incursion is an asset. Direct the invader’s movement into a dynamic system, and you may be surprised how much the cluster can extract from it.”
—Moira Virtue, Ice Engineering, MU (formerly of KKU)
stripped_text: Subroutine Gain 1 credit. You may draw 1 card. Subroutine Gain 1 credit. You may draw 1 card.
text:
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. You may draw 1 card.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. You may draw 1 card.
title: Flywheel

flavor: No one can hear the clamor of the bells and not be alarmed. Least of all the intruder.
stripped_text: click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this ice from HQ: Search R&D for up to 1 barrier and up to 1 sentry and reveal them. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add those cards to HQ. Subroutine The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
text: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this ice from HQ: Search R&D for up to 1 barrier and up to 1 sentry and reveal them. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add those cards to HQ. [subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit]. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Tocsin

flavor: There is no victory which is not also beauty.
stripped_text: Play only if you scored an agenda this turn that you did not install this turn. Add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
text:
Play only if you scored an agenda this turn that you did not install this turn.
Add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
title: Myōshu

flavor: The only blasphemy is to wallow in deletion.
stripped_text: Install and rez 1 piece of ice from Archives, paying a total of 10 credits less. If you rezzed a piece of non-liability ice this way, take 1 bad publicity.
text: Install and rez 1 piece of ice from Archives, paying a total of 10[credit] less. If you rezzed a piece of non-liability ice this way, take 1 bad publicity.
title: Reanimation Protocol

flavor: “The boss likes to swoop in at just the last second. You should consider yourself lucky.”
stripped_text: Gain 14 credits and take 1 bad publicity.
text: Gain 14[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
title: Vulture Fund

flavor: “Gilded lily? Yeah, you can get one in the gift shop.”
stripped_text: HQ or R&D only. Runs against this server cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause runs to become unsuccessful.) Persistent -> During each run against this server, the Runner cannot access more than 1 card other than this upgrade.
text: HQ or R&D only. Runs against this server cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause runs to become unsuccessful.) Persistent → During each run against this server, the Runner cannot access more than 1 card other than this upgrade.
title: Flagship

flavor: You’re on your own.
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When the Runner spends credits from outside their credit pool during a run against this server, you may do 4 meat damage. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Once per turn → When the Runner spends credits from outside their credit pool during a run against this server, you may do 4 meat damage. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Shackleton Grid

stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may search HQ, R&D, or Archives for 1 agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that agenda to HQ or the bottom of R&D. While this agenda is in the Runner's score area, it is worth 1 less agenda point.
text: When you score this agenda, you may search HQ, R&D, or Archives for 1 agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that agenda to HQ or the bottom of R&D. While this agenda is in the Runner’s score area, it is worth 1 less agenda point.
title: Let Them Dream
